welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Davyhulme, a charming city known for its beautiful parks and lively community. We hope you enjoy your stay and take the time to explore everything this wonderful city has to offer."

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The largest and busiest terminal at Manchester Airport, serving a variety of domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Manchester Airport, primarily used by low-cost airlines for European flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: The newest terminal at Manchester Airport, mainly serving long-haul flights to destinations in Asia, Africa, and the Americas.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, with a 4-hour time limit per device.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Liverpool John Lennon Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Charter Terminal
terminals.description: A smaller terminal dedicated to charter flights at Liverpool John Lennon Airport.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport. No registration required.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Warton Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Warton Airport is used for shipping and receiving goods.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
